name: visualize_progress
description: See your weight trends over time, celebrate milestones, and share your wins with beautiful progress cards. View your journey by week, month, or all-time. Get insights and recommendations based on your data. Perfect for staying motivated and showing off your results.

chatgpt_user_id.description: Unique identifier for the ChatGPT user

time_range.description: Time range for progress visualization (default: month)

chart_type.description: Type of chart to generate (default: weight)

generate_shareable.description: Whether to generate a shareable progress card (default: true)

trigger_phrases: how much weight have I lost

shareable_card.title: Lost 5.2 kg in 42 days
shareable_card.preview_text: I'm making progress with LoopGPT! 5.2 kg down, 85% adherence.

response_format.formatted_response: Markdown-formatted progress report with ASCII chart

integration_notes.journey_flow: Journey 6 provides the visual feedback that keeps users motivated. Seeing progress over time and hitting milestones creates a sense of achievement that drives continued engagement.
integration_notes.milestone_detection: Automatically detects weight loss milestones (5 lbs, 10 lbs, 20 lbs), tracking streaks (7 days, 30 days, 90 days), and adherence achievements (90%+, 95%+).
integration_notes.shareable_cards: Progress cards are designed for social sharing, driving viral growth through word-of-mouth. Each card includes impressive stats and a link back to LoopGPT.
integration_notes.chart_generation: Uses ASCII charts for text-based display. Future enhancement could include image generation for more visually appealing charts.
integration_notes.analytics_tracking: Tracks when users view progress and share cards, providing insights into engagement patterns and viral growth.
